trans-unit.source: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> which should receive scroll messages.
trans-unit.target: Classe base do designer para estender o comportamento de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> que deve receber mensagens de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner> provides a base class for designers of controls that respond to scroll messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner> Fornece uma classe base para designers de controles que respondeu para rolar mensagens.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ParentControlDesigner>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> classes, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner> provides a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method override that passes WM_HSCROLL and WM_VSCROLL messages to the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Além dos métodos e funcionalidade herdado da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ParentControlDesigner>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> classes, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner> fornece um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> substituição do método que envia mensagens WM_HSCROLL e WM_VSCROLL para o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If a form has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A> property set to active, the scroll bars are always active in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Se um formulário tem seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AutoScroll%2A> propriedade definida como ativa, as barras de rolagem sempre estão ativas no ambiente de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: You can associate a designer with a type using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode associar um designer de um tipo usando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma visão geral de como personalizar o comportamento de tempo de design, consulte [Estendendo suporte em tempo de Design](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> indicating the position at which the mouse was clicked, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que indica a posição em que o mouse foi clicado, em coordenadas de tela.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a mouse click at the specified point should be handled by the control.
trans-unit.target: Indica se um clique do mouse no ponto especificado deve ser manipulado pelo controle.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a click at the specified point is to be handled by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se um clique em um ponto especificado será manipulado pelo controle. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner.GetHitTest%2A> method determines whether a click at the specified point should be passed to the control, while the control is in design mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ScrollableControlDesigner.GetHitTest%2A> método determina se um clique no ponto especificado deve ser passado para o controle, enquanto o controle está no modo de design.

trans-unit.source: You can override and implement this method to enable your control to receive clicks in the design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir e implementar esse método para habilitar o controle receber cliques no ambiente de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: You can pass a point in screen coordinates to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class to obtain the coordinates of the point relative to the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode passar um ponto em coordenadas da tela para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PointToClient%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> classe para obter as coordenadas de ponto em relação ao canto superior esquerdo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages and passes WM_HSCROLL and WM_VSCROLL messages to the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows e passa mensagens WM_HSCROLL e WM_VSCROLL para o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This override of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A> method passes any WM_HSCROLL and WM_VSCROLL messages to the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Essa substituição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A> método passa as mensagens WM_HSCROLL e WM_VSCROLL para o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: All messages are first passed to the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro, todas as mensagens são passadas para a base de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner.WndProc%2A> método.
